languages.text: "Гонения ведь начались не просто так? Мне доложили, что у одного из вас был найден культистский амулет, и что здесь прячутся еретики".
"The persecution started apropos of nothing, you say? I was told that one of you was found in possession of a cultist amulet, and that there are heretics hiding here."
languages.original_text: "Гонения ведь начались не просто так? Мне доложили, что у одного из вас был найден культистский амулет, и что здесь прячутся еретики".

traits.locale_text: "The persecution started apropos of nothing, you say? I was told that one of you was found in possession of a Chaos amulet, and that there are pirates hiding here."
"The persecution started apropos of nothing, you say? I was told that one of you was found in possession of a Chaos amulet, and that there are pirates hiding here."
"The persecution started apropos of nothing, you say? I was told that one of you was found in possession of a Chaos amulet, and that there are pirates hiding here."
"The persecution started apropos of nothing, you say? I was told that one of you was found in possession of a cultist amulet, and that there are pirates hiding here."
"The persecution started apropos of nothing, you say? I was told that one of you was found in possession of a cultist amulet, and that there are heretics hiding here."

languages.text: “你说这场迫害是无缘无故开始的？我听说你们之中有人戴着邪教的护身符，而且这里还藏着异端分子。”
languages.original_text: "The persecution started apropos of nothing, you say? I was told that one of you was found in possession of a cultist amulet, and that there are heretics hiding here."

traits.locale_text: “你说这场迫害是无缘无故开始的？我听说你们之中有人戴着邪教的护身符，而且这里还藏着海盗。”

languages.text: «¿Dice que la persecución comenzó sin motivo alguno? A mí me informaron de que se encontró a uno de los suyos en posesión de un amuleto sectario y de que hay herejes escondidos aquí».
languages.original_text: "The persecution started apropos of nothing, you say? I was told that one of you was found in possession of a cultist amulet, and that there are heretics hiding here."

traits.locale_text: «¿Dice que la persecución comenzó sin motivo alguno? A mí me informaron de que se encontró a uno de los suyos en posesión de un amuleto sectario y de que hay piratas escondidos aquí».

languages.text: 「迫害は何もないところから始まったと言うのか？お前たちの一人が教団のお守りを所持しているのを発見され、ここに異端者が隠れていると聞いたのだが」
languages.original_text: "The persecution started apropos of nothing, you say? I was told that one of you was found in possession of a cultist amulet, and that there are heretics hiding here."

traits.locale_text: 「迫害は何もないところから始まったと言うのか？お前たちの一人が教団のお守りを所持しているのを発見され、ここに異端者が隠れていると聞いたのだが」

languages.text: "Die Verfolgung begann völlig grundlos, sagt Ihr? Mir wurde gesagt, dass bei einem von Euch ein Kultistenamulett gefunden wurde,. und dass sich hier Ketzer verstecken."
languages.original_text: "The persecution started apropos of nothing, you say? I was told that one of you was found in possession of a cultist amulet, and that there are heretics hiding here."

traits.locale_text: "Die Verfolgung begann völlig grundlos, sagt Ihr? Mir wurde gesagt, dass bei einem von Euch ein Kultistenamulett gefunden wurde und dass sich hier Piraten verstecken."

languages.text: « Vous dites que la répression est injustifiée ? Ce n'est pas ce qu'on m'a raconté. Aux dernières nouvelles, on aurait trouvé une amulette de cultiste sur l'un d'entre vous, et des hérétiques se cacheraient dans vos rangs. »
languages.original_text: "The persecution started apropos of nothing, you say? I was told that one of you was found in possession of a cultist amulet, and that there are heretics hiding here."

traits.locale_text: « Vous dites que la répression est injustifiée ? Ce n'est pas ce qu'on m'a raconté. Aux dernières nouvelles, on aurait trouvé une amulette de cultiste sur l'un d'entre vous, et des pirates se cacheraient dans vos rangs. »

languages.text: "Bu zulüm, gelişigüzel bir durum mu yani? Duyduğuma göre birinizde tarikatçı uğurluğu varmış. Üstelik aranızda kâfirleri barındırıyormuşsunuz."
languages.original_text: "The persecution started apropos of nothing, you say? I was told that one of you was found in possession of a cultist amulet, and that there are heretics hiding here."

traits.locale_text: "Bu zulüm gelişigüzel bir durum mu yani? Duyduğuma göre birinizde tarikatçı uğurluğu varmış. Üstelik aranızda kâfirleri barındırıyormuşsunuz."
